projects.title: Rebel Newcomers Academy
projects.description:
Solving two economical and social problems at the same time; the problem of the screaming shortage of the Dutch job market and it's consequences, the problem of the 75% of unemployment among Syrian newcomers though 53% of them are well educated and experienced.
Rebel Newcomers Academy gives a 4 steps methodology to solve this problem by:
- building a database of talented newcomers according to specific criteria.
- designing a training program to sharpen their skills and teach them new ones that are required and expected in the job market.
- building trust between newcomers and employers.
- facilitating either traineeships or a job for our trainees to ensure a sustainable career for them.

contributors.headline: Compliance Officer 2LoD | Master International Management | Founder Syrian Cotton.nl

projects.title: Het gat vullen
projects.description:
Er zijn twee obstakels die voorkomen dat vluchtelingen de Nederlandse arbeidsmarkt bereiken:
1-	Het gat tussen de werkervaring van Syrische mensen en de eisen van de Nederlandse arbeidsmarkt.
2-	Het gebrek aan vertrouwen tussen de Nederlandse werkgever en de nieuwkomers.
Wij kunnen beide problemen oplossen via het stage programma "Het gat vullen" dat door de gemeente, werkbedrijf ,Nederlandse bedrijven en nieuwkomers zou moeten worden georganiseerd.
Het programma vult het gat en bouwt het vertrouwen tussen de werkgevers en de werknemers van nieuwkomers.

authors.headline: Compliance Officer 2LoD | Master International Management | Founder Syrian Cotton.nl

profile_positions.description:
Empowering communities through sustainable practices, I founded Syrian Cotton with a vision to intertwine the rich textile heritage of Syria with modern, eco-friendly production methods. Our venture not only celebrates the essence of Syrian craftsmanship but also contributes to the socio-economic uplift of the artisans involved.

Thrilled to share that Syrian Cotton was recognized among the top 11 startups in Nijmegen, a testament to our commitment towards social impact and sustainability. Our customer-centric approach has garnered us outstanding reviews on platforms like WebwinkelKeur, TrustPilot, and Google Review, pushing us continually to elevate our standards of quality and service.
profile_positions.title: Founder & CEO

profile_positions.description:
As Lidl Compliance Officer I am responsible for safeguarding the organization from any possible financial, reputational, or process damage. I do that by ensuring the implementation of relevant laws and regulations, and analyzing and assessing risk. My work scope includes compliance policies such as anti-fraud, anti-corruption, Anti-trust, Business Partner research, and our reporting procedure.

My responsibilities and tasks also include:
- Acting as an internal advisor for all compliance issues of the various departments and taking on work on my initiative and proactively.
- Setting and coordinating quarterly and half-yearly reports to the board of management and related bodies. 
- Setting up training courses and e-learning and also giving various compliance training courses myself.
- Managing risk analysis, drawing up an appropriate program based on the results, and implementing appropriate measures. In addition to regularly monitoring the effectiveness of these measures.
- Performing Business Partners' research and due diligence (KYB)
- Handling both external and internal reports (WBR).
- Promoting awareness of the code of conduct and compliance guidelines.
profile_positions.title: Compliance Officer

profile_positions.description:
Being part of the department Corporate Functions Compliance (CFC), our team provides compliance oversight and support for 26 departments in the 4 Domains, to ensure high-quality standards are kept within Compliance and across the other functions.

I have a variety of roles and responsibilities within Corporate Compliance BSF, among others:
 - Advisory: Function as Key Compliance contact for ING Corporate Staff Departments, advise on compliance-related requirements matters (regulatory and conduct compliance as well as financial crime compliance).
 - Supporting: Support in identifying, documenting, and assessing the compliance risks associated with their key activities.
 - Monitoring & reporting: Second Line Monitor and report on operating effectiveness and adherence to applicable laws, regulations, policies, as well as the effectiveness of controls and reporting results. Including frameworks such as ABC, FEC, AML, GRR, GDP, WBR & COI among others. 
 - Ethics, culture training: Support in deepening the culture of compliance and ethical challenges.
 - Leading the process of implementing our yearly plan on Agile Scrum-Kanban environment, coordinating & organizing the weakly stands ups and end Sprint results.
profile_positions.title: Compliance Officer Corporate Compliance, Bank Support Function - 2nd Line of Defence

profile_positions.description:
Founding and leading Rebel Newcomers Academy which is a CSR initiative to solve 2 economic and social problems in the Netherlands; the screaming shortage in the Dutch job market and the high unemployment rate among talented newcomers. 
Responsible for the project starting from research, planning, financial reporting, recruiting, creating training schemes to leading participants toward our goal.
Slowed down by Covid-19, we succeeded in locating 33% of our participants in jobs related to their background. 

The project accomplishments were recognized by Open Rotterdam TV:
https://www.openrotterdam.nl/hoogopgeleide-nieuwskomers-ontvangen-diploma-van-rebel-newcomers-academy/content/item?1153795

And I came 5th by voting in the VPRO Matchmaker in Megrantie contest:
https://pioniers.op.vpro.nl/?id=a34e02148e213112b7c1ed36900bbc1d
profile_positions.title: Project Leader Rebel Newcomers Academy

profile_positions.description:
Providing consultants with the needed assistant, such as:
     - Data finding, sorting, and analysis through statistical packages like R or Excel.
     - Business research.
     - Reports finalizing. 
     - Proposals and solution methodologies co-writing.
     - Financial reports 

Accomplishments:
     - Founder and Project Leader for Rebel Newcomers Academy, a corporate social responsibility project that helped to bridge the gap between unemployed talented newcomers and the personnel shortage in the Dutch job market. 
     - I received a high evaluation for my first year at Rebel for my commitment and good results.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for acquiring new relationships and strengthening existing ones in order to expand the bank's market share. Promoting and selling the Bank's products and services to existing and potential clients. Providing advice and support to both clients and colleagues.

Other responsibilities:
- Accounts Managing, VIPs, Retail, and Corporate.
- Providing services such as checkbooks, time Deposit portfolios, and Safe deposit boxes
- Marketing presentations
- Loan sale and client financials ability assessment
- CDD & KYC
- Debit and Credit Cards sales
- clearing services. 

Accomplishments:
- Received 2 promotions within a year from a Bank Teller to Customer Relationship officer then to Senior Customer Relationship Officer (Branch Assistant Manager).
- I landed and managed a number of the most important accounts in the branch bringing hundreds of millions SYP and tenth of VIPs depositors and loaners.
- I received the highest yearly evaluation in the northern area of Syria before the war, mainly for scoring the highest sales number in the northern area of the country.
- Within the first 6 monthes in the Bank I developed a new training program for new Bank Tellers.
profile_positions.title: Customer Relationship Officer

Arab Bank is one of the largest financial institutions in the Middle East, it serves clients in more than 600 branches spanning five continents.

- Assist Branch Manager in implementing business development strategies.
- Assist Branch Manager to achieve sales targets and projected profit.
- Hire, train, and supervise customer service representatives and financial service managers. 
- Enforce bank regulations and oversee bank security measures and ensure compliance.
- Monitor branch financial activities, performing audits, reviewing reports, and managing cash levels.
- VIP's Account Manager.

volunteer_experiences.role: Vrijwilligerscursus Vluchtelingen: procedure, rechten en herkomst
volunteer_experiences.description:
Several presentations for Dutch volunteers who want to deal with and help refugees.
the presentations talked about:
- Syria, life, and how it was before the war.
- Syrian refugee's background and education.
- the difference in customs.
- tips on how to deal with refugees and what do they really need to succeed in the Netherland.

Presentation for Gemeente (Municipality) Wijchen, and it was about:
 Syria, quality of life before the war.
- Syrian refugee's background and education.
- Cultural differences.
- refugees' challenges and needs after getting a house like how to find a job and integrate into Dutch society.
https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B-xqZQ6KRKunY0dwZVVPN1U0NXhGRnJWWlluWnZqRFJobm1J

In addition, I was a participant in several brainstorming meetings to help the municipality to develop a better plan to help refugees to reach the Dutch job market.

in order to brick the ice between the Dutch society and new Syrian comers i initiate a series of presentations to explain different subjects about Syrian refugees and Syrian people back ground and the similarity in the life style and differences.   

you can find some of the presentations on YouTube:
https://youtu.be/9p0QLKi39aQ
Arabic interpreter and culture advisor at Zorgcafe Nijmegen.
